newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lankan death toll in haj fire rises to three.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lankan death toll in haj fire rises to three.

text.p: Three Sri Lankans died in the fire at the sacred haj ritual in Mena, Saudi Arabia, up from the initial estimate of two, the Foreign Ministry said on Friday.

Sri Lanka's envoy in the kingdom and its health minister, who was on a pilgrimage, are helping the Sri Lankan pilgrims following Tuesday's blaze that swept through 70,000 white tents in the Mena plain, 11 km (seven miles) from Mecca.
The fire killed 343 people and injured 1,290 of an estimated two million Moslems from 100 countries who had gathered for the annual haj pilgrimage.
